name: AllHallow'sFacts
0:
”Alexa, open all hallow's facts and give me some Halloween information”
”Alexa, open all hallow's facts and tell me a Halloween fact”
”Alexa, open all hallow's facts and give me Halloween trivia”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: all hallow's facts
des: This skill is meant to serve as a enjoyable way to learn more about the origins of everyone's favorite fall holiday besides Thanksgiving. In perusing the facts of Halloween, one will come to know the true meaning of the holiday and get a sense of its interesting history and meanings. To get started, just say that you want a Halloween fact. The facts will keep on rolling in after that.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
